string-array.name: loveArray
string-array.item: You make me feel like I am alive.
You are insightful and wise; you see the best in people.
You make me the happiest person on the entire planet.
I love the way that you love me.
You have a strong and radiant personality.
You are my reason to get up every morning.
You have a smile more valuable than diamonds.
You are an amazing cat mom and so incredibly patient.
You are smart and so capable of anything you pursue.
Words cannot express just how much I love you.
You are my favorite face to see in the morning.
I pray that you will be my wife one day.
You are my soulmate and best friend.
If you are feeling bad todayâ€¦ know that I love everything about you.
I miss you more than anything baby.
I promise to love and cherish you forever.
Thank you for making me a better person.
I love the way your hair rests on your shoulders.
Your smile can make my heart skip a beat.
I think you are way cooler than Indiana Jones.
You have amazing taste in music.
You are all I can think about at 12:15 AM (right now).
I am so in love with you.
I love your mind; you inspire me everyday with your intellect.
It is the greatest honor to call you mine.
